hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:It is not good that you people have made us (women) equal to dogs and donkeys. No doubt I saw Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) praying while I used to lie between him and the Qibla and when he wanted to prostrate, he pushed my legs and I withdrew them

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يَغْمِزُ الرَّجُلُ امْرَأَتَهُ عِنْدَ السُّجُودِ لِكَىْ يَسْجُدَ
chapter.eng-name: Is it permissible to touch or push one's wife in prostration in order to prostrate properly?
